title: If I am unable to attend a bridal shower, do I still need to send a gift? If so, what's a good bridal shower gift? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't think it's necessary to send a bridal shower gift if you can't make it. An exception might be if you are going to be a bridesmaid. If that's the case, you may want to pool together a bigger gift from all the bridesmaids for the bride. That's what we did for a recent bridal shower I held - all bridesmaids pitched in money - even those out of town - and we were able to get her something big from her registry. If it's too late or hard to plan for that, you can still send something on your own, but I don't think it's frowned upon if you don't. For some bridal shower gift ideas, see What are good gifts for a bridal shower?

Bridal shower gift is always depends on bride’s taste or wishes. To know what will be the good gift you may from the bride. Or maybe she told you what she would like to have. There are also a professional fluid oils and emulsions that are difficult to choose. But if you know in detail all the preferences of the bride! Go! 6. Perfect choice if someone present a bottle of wine and not only! 10. Cookbook, books, crafty album, candies, other favors. So, if you find this post helpful - write me feedback, please!
